evidence.claim: Recovery Matters claims to adhere to HIPAA regulations for data privacy and security in health tech.
FHIR is mentioned as part of their health data integration for interoperability.
The company emphasizes the importance of EDI processes in their operational workflows.
Recovery Matters provides updates on their engineering practices relevant to health tech compliance.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or API automation needs.
